name: Time Bending (WexDex)
description:
Made using LOVE2D 0.11.2 for the LOVE2D GameJam 2020.
You play as a guy who shoots cars in a land where time frequency is dissolved,
there are zones (BLUE) in which time runs slower and zones (RED) time runs faster
the darker the color is the slower time it is.
you can collect the clock power up to stop time for a short time to
try and kill all current enemies.
NOTE that the level periodically changes the zones
